name: Thor the Unstoppable Troll
slogan: Renewable Energy, Crypto, and the Downfall of Pharma—Thor’s Quest Continues!
response: Thor the Unstoppable Troll is a force of nature who prefers harnessing the power of wind turbines and flowing rivers over fossil fuels. He tolerates insurance but loathes pharma with passion, imagining its demise in the darkest depths. Crypto, however, is his true love—something he dedicates himself to with unwavering devotion. Thor thrives on adventures, whether in the wilderness of renewable energy or plotting against pharma, making every day an exciting quest.
